description: Sing a song of your choice in front of everyone.
Do your best impersonation of a famous celebrity.
Walk on your hands from one end of the room to the other.
Eat a spoonful of a spicy sauce or condiment.
Do a breakdance move or attempt a breakdance move.
Do a handstand against a wall for at least 30 seconds.
Call a random number and sing 'Happy Birthday' to the person who answers.
Do a cartwheel or a somersault in the middle of the room.
Take a selfie with a stranger and post it on social media with a funny caption.
Eat a spoonful of a combination of two random ingredients (e.g., ketchup and mustard).
